In addition to features that fetuses have when they are fetuses, they also
seem to have the potentialto develop many more, including rationality. Op-
ponents of abortion often use this premise to argue that fetuses are persons
and have a right to life. The first problem with this argument is that it seems
to assume that something has a right if it has
